price: Enti Mose maa wͻn (nnwan no) nsuo, afei ͻdanee ne ho kͻͻ nwunu bi mu na ͻkaa sε: ”Me Wura Nyankopͻn, mehia ade pa biara a Wobɛsiane ama me “.
arabic: فَسَقَىٰ لَهُمَا ثُمَّ تَوَلَّىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلظِّلِّ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ إِلَيَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَقِيرٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fasaqā lahumā thumma tawallā ilā al-ẓili faqāla rabbi innī limā anzalta ilayya min khayrin faqīrun
